body:
@shamoya, sorry, I am not so familiar with these stuff.
Output of `ofed_info -s`:
```
MLNX_OFED_LINUX-4.0-2.0.0.1:
```
Output of `ibv_devinfo`:
```
hca_id: mlx4_0
        transport:                      InfiniBand (0)
        fw_ver:                         2.40.7000
        node_guid:                      248a:0703:00bd:5740
        sys_image_guid:                 248a:0703:00bd:5743
        vendor_id:                      0x02c9
        vendor_part_id:                 4099
        hw_ver:                         0x1
        board_id:                       MT_1100120019
        phys_port_cnt:                  1
        Device ports:
                port:   1
                        state:                  PORT_ACTIVE (4)
                        max_mtu:                4096 (5)
                        active_mtu:             4096 (5)
                        sm_lid:                 1
                        port_lid:               18
                        port_lmc:               0x00
                        link_layer:             InfiniBand
```

I think your guess makes sense. I am trying to log all the values of each work completion event. Will get back.
